title: What is auto mode on your phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s more than one “auto mode” on many mobile phones today, one being where the screen automatically increases or reduces screen brightness due to the brightness/darkness of its surroundings. Another is where the display changes from portrait to landscape, depending on which way the phone is held, vertically or horizontally. Some phones automatically change their displays to “night mode”, which is where blue light is removed. This is said to help in aiding sleep. Obviously the phone would revert back to normal daytime mode in the morning.
